overview:
Anisha Ghurye is a young entrepreneur in India. Having pursued her Masters in Marketing Communications, Anisha undertook her dissertation on marketing opportunities in virtual platforms. She worked with Lowe Lintas, in Linteractive (the online marketing division) and managed popular brands like Surf, Vaseline, Maruti, Woodland etc.

Anisha worked with Experience Commerce shortly during IPL 2010 where she handled and executed digital marketing strategy for Royal Challengers Bangalore.

At the young age of 23, Anisha sowed the seeds of her dream and started ‘Right Click’ with Amrita Ramchandran and Dhaval Pancholi. Being one of the founder members and Chief Operating Officer of the company, Anisha takes care of new business development and digital strategies.
